nodes.text: Star Wars: The New Jedi Order: Force Heretic

Star Wars: The New Jedi Order: Force Heretic is a Star Wars Legends Science Fiction Book Club hardcover exclusive that collects all three volumes of the Force Heretic trilogy, as part of Star Wars: The New Jedi Order, from authors Sean Williams and Shane Dix. It was published by the Science Fiction Book Club by arrangement with The Random House Publishing Group in July 2003.
